titleStmt.title: Great Brittans mourning garment Giuen to all faithfull sorrowfull subiects at the funerall of Prince Henry.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Great Britans mourning garment.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
